Reviews.Title: “Quality Suites Lake Buena Vista”
Reviews.Author: elvispeg
Reviews.Content: This was my 2nd stay at Buena vista Quality Suites. The rooms were clean . I liked the suite area and the kitchen and the separate bedroom layout.. The area was perfect. You were close to Disney and restaurants. And UNO happy hours. The breakfast was great. I stayed on the first floor. It was perfect. I will go back again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel & lovely staff”
Reviews.Author: BJ-AV-UK
Reviews.Content: On arrival we were made to feel very welcome by the reception staff, after a long trip from the UK. The location is good,very near to all the theme parks and there are lots of good restaurants and some outlet malls nearby. The rooms are comfortable and clean, and there is a lovely pool area, but the main thing we liked were the staff, they were always extremely helpful and lovely. We moved rooms from the second floor to the fourth floor due to the Wi-Fi internet connection not being so good in our part of the hotel, which was then fine, and a member of staff even phoned us later to make sure all was ok for us :-) how nice :-) There is a free complimentary buffet breakfast which is basic but good; it is served on polystyrene plates and plastic cutlery, but it is free. The layout could be better, as it gets very busy and people bump into each other - especially from 9-9.30 which is when everyone seems to want to eat. Maybe the hotel could look at having the breakfast from 7-10 instead of 6.30-9.30 or have more of a flowing route around the breakfast collection area. Just one important thing to point out: if your stay is longer than 6 nights, the hotel will automatically charge the credit card you used on check in, unless you prepay with the final card you wish to charge you bill to with the full amount. So on checking out, we wished to pay with a US dollar card, but found out that the holding card had already been charged with one portion of the bill at 6 days and the rest on the morning of checkout even before we had arrived at the checkout desk, resulting in charges from both the bank and the hotel. They refunded the card at our request & did charge the dollar card instead (which couldn't be used as a holding card, otherwise we would have, thus avoiding the problem!), but due to the payment being taken and returned, it still cost us over £50.00 in charges for the transactions to be taken and returned, due to exchange rates and bank charges, as well as taking over a week for the refund. Apart from this, we would like to say a big thank you to LARRY, AMINA & all the staff for being so nice & helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Very convenient location.”
Reviews.Author: krbristol
Reviews.Content: Very handy for Disney shopping village and other attractions. Breakfsat is ok but finishes sharp at 9.30 and the layout of breakfast area, means lots of queues for waffle machine. Could easily be improved if they tried. Our first room smelt of cats!! and was near the noisy lift but we moved to a lovely room elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “A Value Choice”
Reviews.Author: ldwheels
Reviews.Content: There were things I liked about this hotel and some things I wish were better. I will agree that it was a good value for the area. The suite room with a seperate bedroom versus sitting area was a great layout. The pool area was nice looking, not super big, but nice. Breakfast was OK with cereals, waffle maker, yogurt, sausage, some circular egg product, small muffins, etc. The area where the food was located was too small and not laid out well for the amount of people. It was like playing bumper cars with people to try and get to the food. The room as I said was roomy. The sitting area and bed area appeared to have been freshened up fairly recently. The bath area (part of the bedroom area) had not been updated recently and was kind of bland and basic. There was a fridge, stove top, and microwave in the room. The sitting bar doubled as an eating area and your desk as there was not a seperate table for a desk to work on computers. The furniture was basic and no frills but was usable. As I said, this was a value type place versus one trying to make a luxury impression. Would I stay here again? Maybe. It would depend upon the price versus the competition. I would not refuse to stay here as it was very good for the price paid. I did like the lower amount of traffic on Palm Parkway versus the Vineland Drive hotels on the other side of I-4. There is also a huge number of eating establishments close by that are mostly of the restaurant chain variety.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for a family vacation!”
Reviews.Author: FefrancoM
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay! The staff was very helpful, the rooms were very comfortable and clean, the refrigerator and other appliances helped us a lot. The breakfast was very good. The hotel is in a great are and it is minutes away from all Disney's parks. We will definitely stay here next time.

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: unclowbrass
Reviews.Content: The rooms here are adequate and clean. Breakfast is more than your average donuts and such. Pool area is nice and the location is easy to Disney, Universal and Seaworld. For the money, this one is tuff too beat.

Reviews.Title: “Would definitely stay here again”
Reviews.Author: sharon415
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay here. The front desk staff were very helpful, and we had no problems whatsoever. We liked the size of our suite, which made our four-day stay very comfortable. It was also convenient to ride the shuttle to EPCOT.

Reviews.Title: “Very good”
Reviews.Author: FaysieE
Reviews.Content: Clean, comfy beds, great breakfast, pool area & pool immaculate. Very helpful & friendly front desk staff. Good location near I-4 and Downtown Disney. Would recommend!

Reviews.Title: “New to Choice Hotels”
Reviews.Author: lakesandi
Reviews.Content: This was our first stay at the Quality Suites on Palm Parkway. The rooms were Very clean. The spa was nice and up to temperature and the exercise room worked very well for us. The property was secure and we felt very safe there.Since we have annual passes to the theme parks we will definately use this hotel again. The staff also was very friendly when I was checking in and out.

Reviews.Title: “service”
Reviews.Author: easy_8
Reviews.Content: Outsanding hotel. Near Disney. Super breakfast! Front desk personel are very helpfull. We stay here at least 4/yr. Don't pass it up.

Reviews.Title: “Had a great stay.”
Reviews.Author: Beverly T
Reviews.Content: We had a group of 52 people. The staff had everything ready for us when we arrived. Everyone was courteous and helpful. The breakfast was good. Nice comfortable rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Good budget hotel with trimmings”
Reviews.Author: Mike M
Reviews.Content: Hotel is all suite. Courteous staff and clean environment. good value for money. Individual air conditioning units. Ours seemed to explode every 90 minutes or so as it re-set fan. Very noisey for a few minutes and then settled down. Otherwise hotel was a bargain!

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: Kenneth F
Reviews.Content: The owner and his staff made my family feel as if we were royalty. The owner was hands on during the complimentary breakfast hours to help make the wonderful waffles. Our suite was very clean and roomy for my family of five. As busy as the hotel was, we could not hear any noise what so ever. We had a great stay and definitely would recommend this hotel as a great value and the drive to Universal Studios was traffic free and within 10 minutes.

Reviews.Title: “Had a great 9 night stay with family of 4, only drawbacks are unheated pool, no gift shop and can't walk across to outlets.”
Reviews.Author: goldiesmd
Reviews.Content: This hotel had pleasant employees, good amenities, very clean rooms, accomidating disney transport, and provided an overall pleasant travel experience.

Reviews.Title: “So good I came back”
Reviews.Author: Knockroe
Reviews.Content: Stayed here on a golfing holiday in the Orlando area. It was a very suitable location to stay and play many good courses in the area. The accommodation was spotless. It was walking distance to many good restaurants. Excellent staff and I got a price reduction to return later on my trip.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Bargain”
Reviews.Author: missy1600
Reviews.Content: We stayed here Feb.1-3rd ,we booked two rooms for a few days in Disney World.The location was perfect only a few miles to Disney lots of restaurants within minutes.The hotel was in excellent shape clean and all the staff were very professional and extremely friendly.We could not have been happier with the comfort and size of the suites.The part was the price,amazing .. Why are all the other hotels charging more.This was a jewel of a find.Thank You,made the trip to a place I had not been in 30 years that much more special

Reviews.Title: “A great stay!”
Reviews.Author: Jaja74
Reviews.Content: Great value and service. Breakfast was ok even though it was the same thing everyday. Front desk was really helpful and friendly. Beds were comfortable and room was really clean. Shuttle buses were on time and the drivers were helpful. All in all, it is a great and economical place to stay. Glad I have read the reviews on tripadvisor before choosing the hotel. Oh..have shops nearby even though it was quite a walk and night time could be a bit dark to be walking by the roadside. Another plus point, the lynx public bus has a stop right in front of the hotel and the lynx no 50 bus goes to disney's transport and ticket center. Took that bus home after magic kingdom, couldn't wait for the shuttle bus, was so tired. So we had the option. The bus also goes go disney downtown.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent cost benefit”
Reviews.Author: BrazilMarcio
Reviews.Content: Hotel has an excellent attention and very good suites. The only penalty is the tedious breakfast that does not change along your stay.

Reviews.Title: “Another Great Stay at Quality Suites”
Reviews.Author: MX1977
Reviews.Content: Great Value, Great Location, Great Service and Friendly Staff. This was our fourth stay (never wrote a review before), but I think they deserve the good rating. Rooms are big. You get your double double, plus a living room and almost full kitchen. Full fridge with freezer (great for frozen food to be prepared throughout the week) and a nice Microwave oven. Service is great. I sent a couple of purchases from Amazon and they handled it ok. I can't imagine staying anywhere else. Our whole family is really comfortable at this hotel. There are lots of parking spaces and have not noticed loud noises from other rooms or hallway. Air conditioning works great but is on the noisy side. Not a problem for us. Breakfast is included and might get somewhat repetitive as days go by. You get boiled eggs, sausages, scrambled eggs cooked like a tortilla, pastries, a waffle machine, juice (not so good), cereals, coffe (we like it), milk, apples, oranges, etc. We usually buy something else we'd like to have for breakfast and get all the other stuff provided by the hotel to the room, or just have a quick bite in the car while going to the parks. Check in and out is super fast, and we've seen lots of maintainance being done to common areas, so they care about the shape the hotel is in. Totally Recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Good Place to stay...Centrally located...however, free brkfst a joke!!!”
Reviews.Author: Lauren M
Reviews.Content: Really nice, clean hotel...stayed there for 5 days as we visited the parks...hotel staff was great...housekeeping was not used much, as i'm funny with random people going through my stuff, but the service was there often if wanted...Shelly ( i think was her name ) was very helpful and sweet...guest services were also very helpful and accommodating... It is in a PERFECT location if you are going to parks/attractions and if you have a car! They do offer a shuttle service, although we did not use it (we are from Fla so had driven there) it would be a bit of a far walk to walk to any major attractions (ie Downtown Disney). Lots of restaurants near by, shops, outlets just up the road... Breakfast at the hotel can be a little misleading based on website...it's a plus because it's free, but it isn't a HOT breakfast buffet...they have 1 waffle maker, and you can get hard~fried egg or sausage...other than that there is cereal, bagels, danish, toast...enough to get you going, but not a "filling" meal. Rooms were nice, clean...bed was uncomfortable for my liking (i like a soft bed)...decent size for vacation...nice size changing area, lots of closet space and drawer space. Kitchen was helpful, although i found we didn't use it nearly as much as we thought we would...having full size fridge was good though... All in all, this was a nice place to stay and would definatly recommmend to a friend...might try somewhere else in the future, just to check it out, but WOULD go back to Quality Suites again! TIP: If you get your booking through third~party (not hotel's website) make sure you call to confirm your room details, we had asked for KIng Suite and were given one with 2 Queens (which was taken care of immediatly by staff). *but also queen suite was larger in the bedroom than the king, we found...Good luck :))))

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel Great Location”
Reviews.Author: ldean17
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this property before. I like the idea of having a suite and the price was so reasonable. There is a bedroom and bath with dressing area, a living room and a kitchen with a full size refrigerator, 2 burner stove, microwave, dishwasher, dishes, silverware and a pot. There are TV's in the bedroom and living room. The rooms were clean and the bed was comfortable. It's in a very good location, close to the attractions. I am an early riser and my husband is not, so the idea of having a living room to sit in and a TV to watch without disturbing him was great. Everything was clean and the staff was nice. We didn't use the other facilites there but did look at the exercize room and it looked spotless. We definitely will be back again. We have stayed at other Choice hotels in Orlando and for the most part, were disappointed. So this will be our home away from home in the future.

Reviews.Title: “great place”
Reviews.Author: JAI-10-10
Reviews.Content: if u r going to disney world, ideal location, good staff, service, close to restaurant etc.i will stay again here on my next trip..front desk person ``larry`` is a good & helpful person..others average..according to my experiance..housekeeping staff is good including the head of them..one of the housekeeper was good to give me direction to business center without asking him..well good place to stay..no complain..

Reviews.Title: “Quality Suites Lake Buena Vista”
Reviews.Author: Roberto R
Reviews.Content: It was a surprise. It was the fourth time in Orlando. Four times, four hotels. The best of them. The crew: they are champions in courtesy. I'll be back there definitely.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value ... Beautiful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ROBIN K
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the hotel December 2011. The location was perfect as we were spending time at Downtown Disney. Less than a mile from entrance. Lots of dining and shopping options nearby. The hotel was superb and very nicely decorated. The room was huge and although only two in the room, it would have easily have slept a family of 6. Front desk was very helpful in getting us directions and recommendations. The free breakfast was very nice and had Eggs, Sausage as well as other things you would normally find on a hotel breakfast free buffet. Nice little pond with walking track for those early morning walks. Pool looked very inviting though we did not use it during our stay. Beds were very comfortable and the decor was refreshing and beautiful. Not sure how old this hotel was but everything looked new. The kitchen area was very spacious and had a full size refrigerator. The gym area looked very nice but we did not use it. The only negative I found and this was very minor and probably not worth even mentioning was that the internet was very slow. We normally stay at Embassy Suites and actually stayed at an Embassy Suites the last night to be closer to the Sanford Airport but the Quality Inn was hands down a much nicer hotel and made the Embassy seem very outdated. Even the time share people in the lobby was helpful and non pushy and added to our overall experience. Very rarely do I write reviews but this property was so deserving I couldnt let it slip by without a recommendation and I look forward to staying here on future visits to Disney..

Reviews.Title: “Oasis of calm away from the Disney bustle”
Reviews.Author: LeicestershireBrian
Reviews.Content: Our third visit to this nice hotel and still as good as ever. It benefits from having a sitting room and a small kitchen area. We like to eat in more than most and it's nice to be able to cook your own thing. Cooking is a bit basic, 2 hot rings, microwave and fridge. Ice box had an efficient ice maker in it and we had to ask for a saucepan - which was provided without any trouble. We enjoyed the quiet of the room and a nice view overlooking the pool. Air conditioning is a bit noisy but we turned it off most of the time, being happy to enjoy the 80 degree temperatures in December! A lovely contrast to the UK. There is an ample supply of tea, coffee, milk, sugar and breakfast items including hot sausages and pancakes. Bath and shower both excellent, plenty of piping hot water and lots of space in the bathroom area and the little dressing area off the bathroom had it's own sink so we could both use the facilities at the same time.

Reviews.Title: “Location, value, service - excellent!”
Reviews.Author: Cheryl-Anne L
Reviews.Content: This moderately priced hotel is very clean and well situated. Rooms are spacious and well equipped. We had a one bedroom suite, which slept the 5 of us, but could have easily slept 6. There's laundry facilities, a gift shop, pool, hottub and computer room. Breakfast buffet had a lot of choices for hot and cold breakfasts - the best breakfast buffet we've ever seen! Shuttle service to Disney was reliable, comfortable, consistent and very accommodating. It was always a lot of fun and laughs on the shuttle bus, which is actually a big coach line. We did walk home from Disney one night and it was a pleasant 20 minute walk. Quality Suites is very close to many immenities. It is a 2 minute walk to a plaza that has many stores and a large variety of restaurants. it is also very close to outlet malls and every kind of shopping you could possibly want. Staff were friendly, courteous and helpful. we had a fantastic stay here. It suited our needs and our budget. We spent most of our time at Disney, but the Quality Suites was a welcome and relaxing place to come back too after a long day of fun in the Parks. I would highly recommend this hotel to any family looking to go to Disney. We'd definitely stay there again! (and probably will)

Reviews.Title: “vacation to orlando with our great accomodations at this facility”
Reviews.Author: yhtfzfw
Reviews.Content: The accommodations at this facility exceeded our expectations and will definitely stay there again on our nexct visit to orlando

Reviews.Title: “It's true!!”
Reviews.Author: david j
Reviews.Content: I won't bother repeating what has already been said over 600 times. This is a great hotel. Nicely decorated rooms, sleep number beds, shuttles, wifi... Look no further. I will stay here EVERY time I come to WDW.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent choice!”
Reviews.Author: Noraleem
Reviews.Content: We have stayed many times at this hotel, they consistently have clean rooms, great service, great breakfast. This last stay was December 9, 2011. Bigger group, 4 adults and 2 kids. Everything was perfect. Will definitely stay again. If you have kids, this is the place to go, kids can sleep on the sofa bed, and you still can catch some tv or read a book.

Reviews.Title: “Broken down suites”
Reviews.Author: Dave1111111
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 7 nites. Room was clean but the first nite we tried to pull out the sofa bed it would get stuck and not open. Called the front desk and they sent someone up to check it out. maint man had alot of trouble but finally got it open. He said it would be replaced while we were out the next day. It wasn't. We then tried to cook on the stove and the knobs would just spin and not turn on the stove. This time went straight to front desk to complain. They gave us anouther room but we had to move all our stuff to the new room at 11pm. Second room was better but the toaster had broken handle and darkness adjustment,.The cookware in room is very limited. Also use the outdoor hot tub and only one of the jets worked.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: poornima v
Reviews.Content: Excellent service,good front desk employees,very clean,good breakfast served and nice location and very close to disney

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel and amenities”
Reviews.Author: levon o
Reviews.Content: My family and I were impressed with your hotel and staff, especially the young(short, blonde, petite) woman who went out of her way to accomidate my family during breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Close to Downtown Disney”
Reviews.Author: optimist333
Reviews.Content: Pros: - Great value - Good breakfast served in a huge breakfast area - Kitchenette is helpful if you have young kids or plan to cook a bit - Close to many restaurants and Downtown Disney - Location is quite attractive, in my opinion Cons: - Couch is really uncomfortable to sit on, but OK to sleep on - Kitchenette only has 2 electric burners and no oven, cooking supplies are limited so if you're planning to do extensive cooking, think twice (e.g., we boiled some pasta in a pot that could only accommodate about half a box of pasta) We've stayed here twice, and would return. It's an excellent value and close to the Disney parks. The rooms are exactly like what's pictured on the hotel website. We loved it here.

Reviews.Title: “Best Value Ever”
Reviews.Author: Cjward
Reviews.Content: We arrived at our hotel. We paid in advance. The front desk lady, Shirley was very nice. The room was very clean and accommodating. The kitchenette was very convenient for a family of five. We had a problem with the pull out sofa bed, but the maintenance man was very prompt in giving it attention. The free hot breakfast was good enough....especially when you consider that's more money that you can spend in the parks. The hotel offers free shuttle service to the four Disney Parks. It was a nice perk, until they ran out of room on the bus and other hotels who contract with the same shuttle service, had guest who cut in line to get a seat on the shuttle. The shuttle actually had people standing up, adults and children while driving to the various destinations. This could have presented a problem, but if free shuttle service is a must, please consider this before placing all your eggs in this basket. You may just want to drive and pay for parking....ITS WORTH PAYING FOR PARKING WHEN YOU'VE BEEN IN THE PARKS ALL DAY , TIRED , AND READY TO GO BACK TO THE HOTEL AND OTHER PEOPLE...MANY WHOM DON'T KNOW ENGLISH, CUT IN FRONT OF YOU AND YOUR FAMILY, WHICH MEANS YOU'LL HAVE TO BE LEFT STANDING OR WAIT FOR THEM TO COME BACK AND GET YOU...PLEASE CONSIDER THIS. I dont know if this is a reflection on the hotel or shuttle service....the hotel in and of itself was an excellent value, i'll definitely stay there again, i'll just drive my own transportation and pay for parking.

Reviews.Title: “Good for those driving down”
Reviews.Author: Anna E
Reviews.Content: Quiet, Clean, great bed with ceiling fan over it, good breakfast, good location between Universal and Disney.. Would stay again. Loved having large refrigerator, cook top, 2 working tvs, and sitting area so husband could sleep longer when I got up. Air conditioner and exhaust fan are loud but we carry a Noise machine to sleep with so it was no problem for us. Dishes had granular stuff on it from dishwashing powder because someone had put something with paper in the dishwasher I think but I just rewashed them. Dishwasher is quite loud also but we ran it when we weren't there so no big deal. I thought this hotel was a great value.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay and would book again.”
Reviews.Author: Jane T
Reviews.Content: First time at this hotel, and it was great. Clean, comfortable, good daily breakfast, and the staff was very nice and accomodating. I'd definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: frank3355
Reviews.Content: This was a great hotel that I chose based on a review on the Hampton next door (which is very highly rated) which said that 'the property next door was nicer'. Well that review was correct... this hotel was clean with great rooms and a very nice staff. I took the chance during our stay to go over to the Hampton to compare, and while okay, it didn't compare at all to what we experienced at this Quality Suites where the lobby and public areas were cleaner and nicer, the rooms are certainly much bigger (since they're all suites), the pool was bigger and nicer (interior courtyard instead of bordering the parking lot), and the shuttle schedule was better (more shuttles each day and also shuttles to the different parks instead of just to Epcot). And all this for a rate that was only $6 more per day than next door. So while this review is not meant to belittle other properties, this place is just so clearly the best choice in that area that I had to explain why it is better than the others.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: funtrip44
Reviews.Content: The room is huge, with a bedroom, kitchen and living area. Easily would sleep 6. The front desk staff was very helpful and pleasant. Would stay there again for sure. Great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: “Only fair”
Reviews.Author: stan_ttcc
Reviews.Content: Hotel was supposed to be a good value having free transportation to the parks as well as a hot breakfast. The first hotel room we had only had the bed made. There was garbage in the room, the bath was not cleaned, the paint was peeling, food in the fridge etc. They changed our room and the second room was okay. Staff generally was helpful. Breakfast was okay.

Reviews.Title: “Mostly satisfied about my (return) visit!”
Reviews.Author: Anika43
Reviews.Content: I've stayed in this area and this hotel a couple of times before and it still is one of my favourites! First of all, the location is excellent (you'll need a car, though): minutes to downtown Disney, 15 minutes to the Disney Parks, 10 minutes to Sea World, 15 minutes to Universal! No need to take the I4, just follow Palm Parkway and Turkey Lake Rd to SW&Uni. There's also a - busy - Wallmart closeby for your groceries. Also compiments for the staff: they are VERY FRIENDLY! Even at the information desk they're very eager to help and will give you discount and/or priority voucher for nearby restaurants (Planet Hollywood etc.). I stayed in a 2Q suites (1K rooms were sold out), which of course was quite comfortable for just me. If you try to squeeze 4 or more people in this room, it will be very tight! Hotel was quiet, breakfast ok and not too crowded. As I traveled alone, I felt pretty safe in and around the hotel and in the area! There are a few cons: 1) airco (still) makes A LOT of noise .. you'll have to turn it off at night and leave the ceilingfan on, but it may get a bit sticky in your room. 2) No in-room safe to store laptop etc. 3) Found 1 cockroach in my room halfway during my stay - killed it - but I still felt a bit squeamish after that. I asume - because I stayed on the 4th floor - it came through the kitchensink-drain, which I plugged after the encounter. 4) This one is more serious: there was a fire-alarm one morning. It was so loud and noisy that you had to leave your room (that's a GOOD thing, you couldn't ignore it). So I left my room, using the stairs to get outside and found many people (some in pyama's and holding small children) waiting there. We waited a while, but NO ONE came out to tell us if it was for real or just a false alarm. Eventually I went inside to ask and the receptionist - who was very busy trying to solve the issue but seemed to be alone - finally told me that it was okay to enter the building again. Seconds later the firedept arrived and I think they checked the cause of the alarm. IT IS VERY IMPORTANT IN SUCH A SITUATION TO KEEP THE GUESTS INFORMED and they failed a bit on that account. All in all, if the price was right I would stay here again (or at the Extended Stay next door, but their 'free breakfast' is not even basic). And keep in mind you'll probably only be in your room to sleep (most days I left at 8.30am and returned after 9pm!).

Reviews.Title: “Clean and quiet. Good choice for a family vacation”
Reviews.Author: ArmandoAriasVzla
Reviews.Content: This is a four story hotel, located near the Walt Disney Resort Area. The neighborhood is quiet & very well landscaped. Suites are spacious and very well designed. We stayed in a one bedroom suite with a full kitchen, utensils, full size fridge, dishwasher, microwave oven and coffe maker. The suite was very clean and housekeeping came everyday to change towels and bed sheets. The staff was very polite and helpful at all times. There is a ticket counter at the lobby with all services you need to bypass lines at parks. There is a continental breakfast buffette served daily from 7 to 10 am, and it's included with your suite charge. There is free wi fi in all suites plus a Business Center with Internet access, fax and printer, Parking is free for all guests and the sourroundings are very vell lit and secure. This was exactly what I was looking for my family. We stayed for three nights on September 12th and got a very good sleep everynight after returning exhausted from the theme parks. I would definetely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money”
Reviews.Author: ChorleyRecruiter
Reviews.Content: This hotel was excellent with a spacious room and free hot buffet breakfast and great value at $55 per night (we stayed there for 5 nights). It's situated at the top end of Palm Parkway and a short safe walk to a variety of restaurants - Olive Garden being our personal favourite. The lobby areas were clean and tastefully decorated and our room which had a seperate bedroom and a fold down bed in the lounge area was good for as we were travelling with a 9 year old. The hotel offers plenty of safe free parking and it's a short drive to downtown disney and convenient for the theme parks and Sea World. The only downside was that the pool because it sits in the middle of the hotel block tended to be shady all the time and consequently was very cold. I would recommend this hotel and would stop there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great choice this time!!”
Reviews.Author: David M
Reviews.Content: our Room was always clean The front staff was very friendly, made us all feel welcome and appreciated. Responded quickly to all our request The shuttle to Disney was convenient. Breakfast was as one would expect. Lobby and public areas were very nice and tasteful. Location was terrific; safe and convenient to attractions and restaurants. I had a car, so free parking was appreciated. I think it was a good choice. I would recommend this Hotel to all reviewers.

Reviews.Title: “REALLY AFFORDABLE HOME AWAY FROM HOME!!”
Reviews.Author: david j
Reviews.Content: My family and I spent four days at the hotel and will definitely return. The staff was awesome and the facilities were clean, comfortable and nicely appointed.I feel that we got a great deal for our budget. It was located close to the attractions and the kids had a blast.

Reviews.Title: “It was okay... You get what you pay for...”
Reviews.Author: parzak
Reviews.Content: This property is very close to restaurants and close to shopping. Quite easy to find. We booked this hotel because of the cheap price, you get a separate room and had a kitchen. Overall, it was a decent place to stay the night. You are at the parks for most of the day anyways, so the hotel is just a place to sleep. The place really does need updating. The breakfast buffet is very good - hot as well as cold breakfast items, however, after 7 days of the same stuff over and over again, it got pretty tiring. The room we had, the stove didn't work and the air-con was so loud at night that it would wake us up everytime it would kick in.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Find”
Reviews.Author: Shmol
Reviews.Content: We were very happy with this hotel. Firstly and most importantly it offered great value for money. Our room was actually a suite with full kitchen, although we didn't get a chance to use it. The breakfast was great and the pool area large and cozy. The pool itself wasn't very deep, but deep enough to have a nice splash. Free Wi-Fi in room was a great bonus for us. The service was also great and friendly. If we ever return to Orlando we will surely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Good if on a budget”
Reviews.Author: tvpromo
Reviews.Content: Full disclosure - I am a Choice Privileges member which means I stayed here for free on points. I always begin my free Choice Hotel stay reviews with the question - Would I have paid and been satisfied? Answer for this hotel stay is "Probably". Very nice location and very convenient to stores, restaurants and Disney World. 5 min ride to Disney. Shuttle leaves once or twice in the morning to Disney and returns at night but we opted to drive so we could return on our own schedule. Kitchenette very convenient for family. Full size frig, 2 burners, dishwasher, counter, microwave, even silverware and dishes. Laundry room is convenient and clean. Small supply store in lobby. Good fitness room. Breakfast until 10am. GREAT outdoor pool. Relatively clean rooms. Separate bedroom and TV room. They are a "Disney-friendly" hotel which means Disney allows them to sell park tickets in the lobby - here's the catch - You have to sit through a one-on-one time share presentation. They claim it's 90 minutes but ended up being about 2 1/2 for us. We saved about $400 on tickets. After the woman gave us the comparison costs, that's when she hit us with the time share requirement. We went for it. We had built 2 extra days into our vacation so we had some extra time. We picked a morning we knew the weather would be bad and raining. They shuttled us over to the time share complex 10 minutes away (very nice) and we met with the sales guy. Typically like-able sales guy until he realized we weren't going to buy. Then he tried to turn the wife on me with a guilt trip. Kinda crappy but I don't care. Wife was on my side and we saved $400+ vs the online prices posted at the Disney site. If you don't typically give in to pressure easily and have extra time, go for it. I learned a lot about how time shares operate. Otherwise, get your tickets somewhere else. We payed $970 for 3 parks/5 people + one water park (Blizzard Beach) - 4 adults and 1 child (kids 10 and over are considered 'adults' for Disney tickets) 3 parks If you are on a budget and don't care for the Disney resort experience (just want time at the parks!) this is good cheap hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Quality Suites = Quality Time”
Reviews.Author: Sc0ttishtravellers
Reviews.Content: We (a family of four) have just come back from staying at quality suites LBV for a fortnight and have nothing but high praise to offer for this hotel. It is an excellently priced centrally located base for all of the main attractions ( 5mins by car to disney and universal and near premium outlets and walmart). Room was clean bright and everything as promised, staff were polite, friendly and always happy to help, especially Larry and Tara who we had most dealings with were especially nice. Housekeeping and maid service every day and housekeepers were helpful and accomodating. Having kitchenette and seperate living area was a real bonus as was cable TV. Breakfast was ample and a good start to the day, complimentary Wall St Journal was added bonus, kids loved the free WI-Fi. Having a laundry room meant taking home dirty washing was minimal. Pool was fab as is hot tub, fresh clean towels also provided regularly. Despite large volumes of guests the hotel was quiet and unassuming, parking never a problem and free into the bargain! We were slightly concerned about the negative reviews on this site however our experiences were all positive, the only slight negative was the ticket selling booth which offered a great price on discounted tickets for the evening shows but only once hooked on the price do u get informed that you have to attend a timeshare talk to get this discounted deal so beware!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Good Ammenities, Great Location & Good for Families”
Reviews.Author: Frugalvalen
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel by far. Ammenties in this hotel exceeded all of my expectations. Management was helpful and it is very clean. Hotel is centralized and with close proximity to the Magic Kingdom Parks, within walking distance of shops, restaurants, Pubs and supermarket. You will enjoy your stay at this hotel. I noticed a lot of police patrolling the surrounding areas, therefore you should feel safe. Not congested by traffic or any crowds. I recommend this hotel to all the families traveling with elderly, young childrens, and young teenagers.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Spot”
Reviews.Author: Traveler06232009
Reviews.Content: We spent 10 days in this hotel. Over all we were very pleased with it. The only down side I can think of is that some of the furniture was getting kind of old and worn looking - like the couch and and the chair, but other than that it was nice. Beds were comfortable. Breakfast was ample and a lot of variety. We faced the pool and it was quiet. Some people said that the A/C was noisey. It was a bit, but not bad. I would definitely consider staying here again on another trip to the Disney area. You are only about 5-10 minutes from downtown Disney. Hotel is located in quiet area. Great Spot.

HotelInfo.Name: Quality Suites Lake Buena Vista
HotelInfo.Address: 8200 Palm Parkway, Orlando, FL 32836
